text: Hardi Pardaillan! is a 1964 French-Italian adventure film directed by Bernard Borderie and starring Gérard Barray, Valérie Lagrange, Philippe Lemaire, Sophie Hardy, and Guy Delorme. It was also known as The Gallant Musketeer. ==Cast== * Gérard Barray as Pardaillan * Valérie Lagrange - Bianca Farnèse * Philippe Lemaire - The Duke of Angoulême * Guy Delorme - Maurevert * Sophie Hardy * Jean Topart - The Duke of Guise * Jacques Castelot - Henri III * Caroline Rami - Rousotte. * Robert Berri - Gueule d'mour ==Release== Hardi Pardaillan! was shown in Italy on February 29, 1964 and in France on April 8, 1964. ==References== ==External links== Category:1964 films Category:French films Category:Italian films Category:French adventure films Category:Italian adventure films Category:French-language films Category:1964 adventure films Category:Swashbuckler films Category:Films directed by Bernard Borderie Category:Films set in the 16th century Category:French sequel films
